items.title: Ecuador votes against allowing foreign military bases in country
items.summary_short: Ecuador votes against allowing foreign military bases in country. Voters have rejected a referendum proposal, dealing a blow to President Daniel Noboa and US ambitions in the region.
items.summary_medium: Ecuador votes against allowing foreign military bases in country. Voters have rejected a referendum proposal, dealing a blow to President Daniel Noboa and US ambitions in the region.

items.title: Thousands protest against government in Mexico as clashes leave 120 injured
items.summary_short: Thousands protest against government in Mexico as clashes leave 120 injured. The protests came weeks after Carlos Manzo, mayor of Uruapan, was killed.
items.summary_medium: Thousands protest against government in Mexico as clashes leave 120 injured. The protests came weeks after Carlos Manzo, mayor of Uruapan, was killed.

items.title: Brazil's Amazon rainforest at risk as key protection under threat
items.summary_short: Brazil's Amazon rainforest at risk as key protection under threat. Brazilian farmers want to end a ban on planting soya on cleared land, which critics say would spur deforestation.
items.summary_medium: Brazil's Amazon rainforest at risk as key protection under threat. Brazilian farmers want to end a ban on planting soya on cleared land, which critics say would spur deforestation.

items.title: Jurors in high-profile Australian trial visit beach where murder victim found
items.summary_short: Jurors in high-profile Australian trial visit beach where murder victim found. Rajwinder Singh denies stabbing the 24-year-old to death in October 2019.
items.summary_medium: Jurors in high-profile Australian trial visit beach where murder victim found. Rajwinder Singh denies stabbing the 24-year-old to death in October 2019.

items.title: Trump calls on House Republicans to vote to release Epstein files
items.summary_short: Trump calls on House Republicans to vote to release Epstein files. "We have nothing to hide," the US president writes after previously resisting publishing the documents.
items.summary_medium: Trump calls on House Republicans to vote to release Epstein files. "We have nothing to hide," the US president writes after previously resisting publishing the documents.

items.title: Communist and far-right candidates head to Chile presidential run-off
items.summary_short: Communist and far-right candidates head to Chile presidential run-off. The Communist Party's Jeanette Jara will face far-right candidate José Antonio Kast in the second round of voting in December.
items.summary_medium: Communist and far-right candidates head to Chile presidential run-off. The Communist Party's Jeanette Jara will face far-right candidate José Antonio Kast in the second round of voting in December.

items.title: The oil pipeline feud testing Canada's global ambitions
items.summary_short: The oil pipeline feud testing Canada's global ambitions. The rift between two provinces at odds over a proposed pipeline is straining Canada's unity as it seeks to become an energy superpower.
items.summary_medium: The oil pipeline feud testing Canada's global ambitions. The rift between two provinces at odds over a proposed pipeline is straining Canada's unity as it seeks to become an energy superpower.

items.title: Two US marines implicated in killing family in notorious Iraq war shooting, expert tells BBC
items.summary_short: Two US marines implicated in killing family in notorious Iraq war shooting, expert tells BBC. New evidence raises doubts about the longest US war crimes investigation of the Iraq war and how US forces are held to account.
items.summary_medium: Two US marines implicated in killing family in notorious Iraq war shooting, expert tells BBC. New evidence raises doubts about the longest US war crimes investigation of the Iraq war and how US forces are held to account.

items.title: Hackers steal maternity ward CCTV videos in India cybercrime racket
items.summary_short: Hackers steal maternity ward CCTV videos in India cybercrime racket. Police say that dozens of videos of pregnant women undergoing medical check-ups were sold on the internet.
items.summary_medium: Hackers steal maternity ward CCTV videos in India cybercrime racket. Police say that dozens of videos of pregnant women undergoing medical check-ups were sold on the internet.

items.title: Federal agents launch immigration crackdown in city of Charlotte
items.summary_short: Federal agents launch immigration crackdown in city of Charlotte. Operation "Charlotte's Web" is part of Donald Trump’s attempt to deliver "the largest deportation programme" in US history.
items.summary_medium: Federal agents launch immigration crackdown in city of Charlotte. Operation "Charlotte's Web" is part of Donald Trump’s attempt to deliver "the largest deportation programme" in US history.
